html:
6.27.22  6:56 pm   what is a cool name

      bun

6.27.22  6:29 pm   does any one person fully understand how everything in a computer works?

      only the computer's mother

6.27.22  5:53 pm   why does music matter

      because that's what everyone wants, in some way

6.27.22  4:33 pm   is a satellite a future entertainment system or a part of a future entertainment system? will people in the future say "yeah, i play on my satellite"

      it's already part of our entertainment systems, but we don't mention it. like you wouldn't usually say "i'm playing with my electricity"

6.27.22  4:17 pm   do you still use the steering wheel to turn left or righton a ground plane?

      the ground plane is the same if you turn it left or right

6.27.22  4:12 pm   can your next song have the letter J (capitalized optional) in it?

      all options are on the table

6.27.22  3:05 pm   what advice will you give to the man who only makes a little nice-sounding melodies but can't turn anything into a full-sized songs?

      have you tried any words yet, if not, then go ahead, try a word

6.27.22  2:47 pm   What are your thoughts on fruits?

      they might be a vegetable

6.27.22  2:00 pm   how did you make the short string flourish in the "ground plane" video (the one right before the airport staff says, "maybe you'd like to try one of our ground planes")?

      play a scared chord on the strings, then add tremolo and adjust the rate and depth to taste. crank up the depth, for extreme flicker

6.27.22  11:43 am   Have you ever encountered a paradox?

      no way

6.27.22  8:53 am   what would you buy if you hade infinity amounts of cash 

      lunch

6.27.22  7:15 am   Will you buy twitter?

      the price is wrong

6.27.22  7:14 am   Is ground plane really ground plane when it's on the ground?

      yes

6.27.22  6:53 am   When you answer "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes" (or the opposite), is that actually what happened when you thought about that question,

     yes

     or do you just use it as a fancier answer?

6.27.22  6:14 am   where does the ground plane depart from? 

      the... ground

6.27.22  3:14 am   will you ever do a bloopers video

      sure, how about this

6.27.22  1:45 am   Will you ever write a song about hurricanes?

      all options are on the table

6.26.22  10:23 pm   why did you choose to be a musician?

      i already was

6.26.22  9:24 pm   Do you live in a mushroom house

      it's me, i'm the mushroom

6.26.22  9:05 pm   please may you present me with one (1) fact about Fly Around?

      it used to be called 'special sandals'

6.26.22  6:14 pm   Would you like a box of thin mints?

      how about a thin box of mints

6.26.22  4:57 pm   why is the letter U taken out of words sometimes? (ex: color colour, favorite favourite)

      they used it for the st louis arch

6.26.22  4:16 pm   what rhymes with "toe"?

      noe

6.26.22  4:03 pm   ground plane was too good. make something worse pleas3e

      i'll see what i can do

6.26.22  2:35 pm   I got a keyboard and don't know how to use it aaa help

     just press the buttons. and go from there

6.26.22  2:33 pm   Would you want a bagel or a glass of orange juice?

      there's gotta be some middle ground

6.26.22  1:55 pm   Do you feel like you loose focus on the thing if you focus on why the thing 

      could happen

6.26.22  12:14 pm   What is your favourite ingredient to put in a salad?

      pizza

6.26.22  11:28 am   Will you dress in a costume

      whatever gets the job done

6.26.22  10:28 am   how do you swiftly get away from the hotel where you're staying with a ground plane?

      change your mind about whether to go to the hotel in the first place. hotel was too high anyway. it was probably on top of several other hotels

6.26.22  10:13 am   How does one actually "make a mountain out of a molehill"?

      retreat into the depths of your imagination

6.26.22  8:22 am   everything is the process between something and nothing?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.26.22  4:23 am   in "slow down" you've shown your video making process.

     that's fake / satire

      do you still use that technique?

     i still don't

6.26.22  4:07 am   have you ever given birth 

      not that i recall

6.26.22  2:44 am   i dare you to use yuckbrown in one of your future videos.

     i have used it. it's just probably not the most often

     i believe that all colours can look pleasing if they're in the right context, do you?

     yes

6.26.22  2:40 am   have you ever thought of becoming a genius?

      that will never work

6.26.22  1:08 am   do you listen to music while creating your music?

      yes but only the song i'm working on

6.26.22  12:07 am   will we ever go to mars?

      someone will

6.25.22  11:18 pm   how much would you recommend the ground plane

      it can be a useful concept if you are feeling overwhelmed

6.25.22  10:31 pm   I got an idea for a song, but the time signature is 43/4 and GarageBand doesn't go that high. What do I do?

      use time signature changes. depending on how it's felt, you can break it up in different ways, but at least you can just do 10 bars of regular and then 1 bar of 3/4 and at least it will hit the downbeat right. and if the accented clicks are bugging you then you can just mute the click and make your own click track

6.25.22  9:28 pm   should i just get it together and stop being afraid?

      as long as you make arrangements to be afraid at some point later

6.25.22  9:24 pm   What time does the next ground plane depart?

      0:00

6.25.22  8:02 pm   thoughts on instant noodles?

      "I never knew just how long an instant could be."

6.25.22  6:52 pm   Is your "ground plane" video sponsored by Upward Airlines?

      no

6.25.22  3:28 pm   is a ground plane actually a huge car

      no

6.25.22  2:20 pm   Would you ever go skydiving?

      no

6.25.22  1:51 pm   do you know how to use a computer?

      almost

6.25.22  12:00 pm   what's an object that makes you feel warm and comfortable

      the........ sun

6.25.22  11:33 am   I'm a drummer who wants to learn more about chords and chord-like concepts. Where should I begin? <3

      i'd say you could get some type of piano keyboard. that will probably start turning some lights on for you

      i'd say you could get some type of piano keyboard. that will probably start turning some lights on for you
